mapper.select: SELECT info.id, info.order_no, info.start_location, info.end_location, IF(info.status < 7, info.expect_amount, bill.pay_amount) AS amount, info.status, info.create_time FROM daijia_order.order_info info LEFT JOIN daijia_order.order_bill bill ON info.id = bill.order_id WHERE info.customer_id = #{customerId} AND info.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY info.create_time DESC

SELECT info.id, info.order_no, info.start_location, info.end_location, IF(info.status < 7, info.expect_amount, info.real_amount) AS amount, info.status, info.create_time FROM daijia_order.order_info info WHERE info.driver_id = #{driverId} AND info.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY info.create_time DESC
